name: Make it Big in Hollywood
description:
Lisa, a sweet country girl, has just one ambition – to make a name of herself in glamourous Hollywood! But how will she fare in the cut-throat world of business? Help Lisa face the challenges and experience the joy of working in the movie business, the allure of the spotlight and the prestige of the red carpet! Follow Lisa's journey as she learns the intricacies of running her own movie studio. Visit the world's trendiest movie festivals, meet celebrities and fall madly in love!

- Play in 6 amazing locations with more than 70 exciting levels
- Test your director skills in thrilling mini-games
- Make more than 25 exciting movies, in different genres, with celebrity actors
- Experience a sweet love story
